attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and i honestly think it has the worst in app experience I’ve ever tested. It feels clunky and honestly turns me away from trump you can tell the campaign is going down.

attributes.title: Bad APP DO NO DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is horrible it made me throw up and it says things that are not about mlp like? It’s run by an orange? What kind of app is this? The person running this is clearly not smart enough to run an app- delete this app (go to tiktok) instead 😼🖐

attributes.title: the worst
attributes.review: this is by far the worst app i’ve ever downloaded. it took FOREVER to download and when i opened it, only a picture of an orange roach showed up and the only way to exit was to exit the app.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this app is so terrible it first of all took a month to download and then when i got on i saw an orange on the screen and then it proceeded to tell me to get all the oranges i could in a matter of time before the orange president came to my house and murdered me! then i had to sacrifice a goat and then it bled out oranges and this is all the apps doing there is way more but if you are to ever download this delete it right away!! >:(

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: It took eleven weeks to even reach the half point of downloading, and the name is just so so so ugly, I hate the colors, and it doesn’t even work properly, also I keep seeing some ugly orange dude on it jeez

attributes.title: HIGH RISK OF DEATH👿☠️💀☠️
attributes.review: This app contains material that could kill you just by reading and looking at it. This app spreads lies about trump being a good president. Seeing pictures of trump on this app could blind you permanently because your eyes refuse to look at something THAT ugly. THE STUPIDITY OF THIS APP COULD CAUSE A MAJOR HEART ATTACK OR DEATH. DO NOT DOWNLOAD !!!!!!!🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫

attributes.title: Communist propaganda
attributes.review: This app is full of communist propaganda! I can’t believe the level of hate Trump has for minorities. The set up of the app is terrible too. I’d stay away from this one if I were you. It’s as if hitler had an app

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: It made my phone freeze every second and it was glitchy overall wouldn’t recommend to anyone

attributes.title: Wow...hate it.😡✨🙈
attributes.review: This app was terrible it took a whole week to download I hate it it works for nothing absolutely terrible do not download this app you heat it up with all cost I I could never stop do not download this app.😡

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: It took FOREVER to download, didn’t work when I wanted it to, stoped loading after a while, didn’t work and then as soon as I entered the app it asked for my credit card number. Eww.
